scripts.day01: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day01.ts && node day01.js" --watch day01.ts
scripts.day02: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day02.ts && node day02.js" --watch day02.ts
scripts.day03: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day03.ts && node day03.js" --watch day03.ts
scripts.day04: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day04.ts && node day04.js" --watch day04.ts
scripts.day05: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day05.ts && node day05.js" --watch day05.ts
scripts.day06: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day06.ts && node day06.js" --watch day06.ts
scripts.day07: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day07.ts && node day07.js" --watch day07.ts
scripts.day08: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day08.ts && node day08.js" --watch day08.ts
scripts.day09: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day09.ts && node day09.js" --watch day09.ts
scripts.day10: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day10.ts && node day10.js" --watch day10.ts
scripts.day11: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day11.ts && node day11.js" --watch day11.ts
scripts.day12: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day12.ts && node day12.js" --watch day12.ts
scripts.day13: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day13.ts && node day13.js" --watch day13.ts
scripts.day14: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day14.ts && node day14.js" --watch day14.ts
scripts.day15: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day15.ts --target "ES2022" && node --max-old-space-size=24000 day15.js" --watch day15.ts
scripts.day16: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day16.ts --target "ES2022" && node --max-old-space-size=2000 day16.js" --watch day16.ts
scripts.day17: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day17.ts --target "ES2022" && node --max-old-space-size=2000 day17.js" --watch day17.ts
scripts.day18: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day18.ts --target "ES2022" && node --max-old-space-size=2000 day18.js" --watch day18.ts
scripts.day19: nodemon --exec "clear tsc day19.ts --target "ES2022" && node --max-old-space-size=2000 day19.js" --watch day19.ts
scripts.day20: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day20.ts --target "ES2022" && node --max-old-space-size=2000 day20.js" --watch day20.ts
scripts.day21: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day21.ts --target "ES2022" && node --max-old-space-size=2000 day21.js" --watch day21.ts
scripts.day22: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc global.d.ts day22.ts --target "ES2022" --types "node" --moduleResolution node && node --max-old-space-size=2000 day22.js" --watch day22.ts
scripts.day23: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day23.ts --target "ES2022" && node --max-old-space-size=2000 day23.js" --watch day23.ts
scripts.day24: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day24.ts --target "ES2022" && node --max-old-space-size=2000 day24.js" --watch day24.ts
scripts.day25: nodemon --exec "clear && tsc day25.ts --target "ES2022" && node --max-old-space-size=2000 day25.js" --watch day25.ts
